mods.name: RelativeConsumptionTime
mods.description: Small QoL mod which changes the absolute time for eating and drinking to a configurable relative time in proportion to the consumed amount.

mods.name: Ankle-Support
mods.author: WulfMarius, zeobviouslyfakeacc and Remodor
mods.description: Mod which fixes sprain bugs in TLD and adds configurable sprain support for wrists and ankles.

mods.name: WeaponImprovements
mods.description: Small configurable QoL mod which improves the weapon handling and adds the ability to interrupt the reloading process or disable the ammo hud.

mods.name: FireImprovements
mods.description: Configurable QoL mod all around fire. Including, remember last used fire item, better item sorting for fire starting, better torch/ flare support for fire starting, better torch usability outside of fire starting, configurable no-tinder penalty and no magic fire duration boost.

mods.name: AnimalBehavior
mods.author: AlexTheRegent, ds5678 and Remodor
mods.description: Let's you customize many animal behavior like fleeing duration, bleed out modifier, wolf behavior on aiming and many more, in addition to the included and enhanced TweakRabbits and DetectionRange. These mods are obsolete and have to be removed in order to use this mod!
